credit_line: Museum purchase through the gift of Mrs. Edward C. Post
title: Design for Musaphonic Clock Radio on Legs, in green, General Electric
provenance: Norman Brosterman, New York, NY; Richard Arbib, New York, NY
medium: Gouache, brown watercolor, gray pastel, graphite on vellum
description: Prespective drawing of green clock radio featuring towering speaker enclosure, small enclosed tuning dial on left, and small enclosed clock on right.  Features central leg support, possibly a tripod, likely chrome.  Lucite "Musaphonic" badge between tuning and clock, and General Electric badge in center of speaker enclosure.  Tuning features two brass knobs.  Clock features three white knobs.
name: Drawing
